Events 14/05/19
Curator’s Guided Tour with Felix Hoffmann
Boris Mikhailov - Before Sleep / After Drinking
Begin 6 pm 
Ticket 15/11 Euro incl. exhibition . Available online (plus booking fee) and at C/O Berlin

Unique, entertaining and informative—experience the exhibition through the eyes of the curators, experts, and exhibition organizers. Felix Hoffmann, chief curator at C/O Berlin, will guide you through the exhibition Boris Mikhailov - Before Sleep / After Drinking.
